headline: Textron Aviation Raises the Bar for Workforce Development With State-of-the-Art Career & Learning Center
summary: WICHITA, Kan., April 23, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc. a Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) company, today announced its new Career & Learning Center is complete and fully operational serving prospective, current and future Textron Aviation employees. Strategically located on the company’s East Wichita Campus, this state-of-the-art facility expands the training footprint to more than 75,000 square feet and provides a world-class employee experience during the application, hiring, onboarding and training pro

headline: Boeing (BA) Reports Q1 Loss, Tops Revenue Estimates
summary: Boeing (BA) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 68.18% and 1.08%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

summary: Aerospace and defense company Textron (NYSE:TXT) will be reporting earnings tomorrow before the bell. Here’s what you need to know.
